casename: Group Exklusiv Pte Ltd v Diethelm Singapore Pte Ltd
counsel: R. Chandra Mohan and Edric Pan (Rajah & Tann) for plaintiffs; Chan Hian Young and Ginny Chew (Allen & Gledhill) for defendants
tags-parsed: Land/Sale of land/Agreement subject to purchaser obtaining approval from authorities/Whether authorities finally and conclusively rejected application for approval
Land/Sale of land/Clause requiring purchaser to use best endeavours to apply for approval/Scope of purchaser's obligation to use best endeavours
